column6: "NEW MUTANTS" pt. 1 (of 5) Jump on board the top franchise with this special 'ULTIMATE STARTS' debut of a new, highly accessible story arc! The U.S. Government is suspicious of Professor Xavier's motives, so it sets a plan in motion to be prepared for any X-Men-related contingency.  "NEW MUTANTS" will introduce several brand-new additions to the cast, including Warren Worthington III - the ANGEL, and punk musician the DAZZLER!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):David Finch | inker:Art Thibert
